title: botted account/abuse player/troll
body:
just had this guy troll and be abusive in champ select (says his account is botted too) thankfully someone dodged but what can you do, lose the game then report them after :/

https://gyazo.com/711cab2dbd2bc7c0150b8cc020bf2990
https://gyazo.com/2a0aea8ce8eb324edb1eaa20486d7de5
https://gyazo.com/abf5fc4f9ce6a7448ee4c8a52917ae6a

replies.body:
Complain to Riot, they are getting money hungry and don't care about bot's or AFK players.

Boycott buying anything until something is done.
